verses.verse: And I saw <S%G3708><s%> in the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on the throne <S%G2362><s%> a book <S%G975><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> inside <S%G2081><s%> and on the back, <S%G3693><s%> sealed <S%G2696><s%> up with seven <S%G2033><s%> seals. <S%G4973><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> and to break <S%G3089><s%> its seals <S%G4973><s%>?"

And no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> on the earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> or <S%G3777><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> into it.

And I [began] to weep <S%G2799><s%> greatly, <S%G4183><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> or <S%G3777><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> into it;

and one <S%G1520><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "Stop <S%G3361><s%> weeping; <S%G2799><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lion <S%G3023><s%> that is from the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Judah, <S%G2455><s%> the Root <S%G4491><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> has overcome <S%G3528><s%> so as to open <S%G455><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> and its seven <S%G2033><s%> seals. <S%G4973><s%>"

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> between <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> (with the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%>) and the elders <S%G4245><s%> a Lamb <S%G721><s%> standing, <S%G2476><s%> as if <S%G5613><s%> slain, <S%G4969><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> and seven <S%G2033><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> out into all <S%G3956><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
And He came, <S%G2064><s%> and He took <S%G2983><s%> [it] out of the right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> of Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on the throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> He had taken <S%G2983><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> and the twenty-four elders <S%G4245><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> a harp, <S%G2788><s%> and golden <S%G5552><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of incense, <S%G2368><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

And they sang <S%G103><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song, <S%G5603><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Worthy <S%G514><s%> art <S%G1510><s%> Thou to take <S%G2983><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and to break <S%G455><s%> its seals; <S%G4973><s%> for Thou wast slain, <S%G4969><s%> and didst purchase <S%G59><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> with Thy blood <S%G129><s%> [men] from every <S%G3956><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> and tongue <S%G1100><s%> and people <S%G2992><s%> and nation. <S%G1484><s%>
"And Thou hast made <S%G4160><s%> them [to be] a kingdom <S%G932><s%> and priests <S%G2409><s%> to our God; <S%G2316><s%> and they will reign <S%G936><s%> upon the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> around <S%G2945><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and the living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> and the elders; <S%G4245><s%> and the number <S%G706><s%> of them was myriads <S%G3461><s%> of myriads, <S%G3461><s%> and thousands <S%G5505><s%> of thousands, <S%G5505><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Worthy <S%G514><s%> is the Lamb <S%G721><s%> that was slain <S%G4969><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and riches <S%G4149><s%> and wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and might <S%G2479><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> and blessing. <S%G2129><s%>"

And every <S%G3956><s%> created <S%G2938><s%> thing <S%G2938><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> and on the earth <S%G1093><s%> and under <S%G5270><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and on the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> in them, I heard <S%G191><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "To Him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and to the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> [be] blessing <S%G2129><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> and dominion <S%G2904><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>"

And the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> kept saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen. <S%G281><s%>" And the elders <S%G4245><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> down <S%G4098><s%> and worshiped. <S%G4352><s%>
